mapper.select: SELECT * FROM category ORDER BY idx

SELECT a.idx , a.title , a.price , c.content , c.view_count , c.image , d.name FROM game a INNER JOIN game_type b ON a.idx = b.game_idx INNER JOIN board c ON c.idx = a.board_idx INNER JOIN member d ON d.idx = c.user_idx GROUP BY a.title ORDER BY a.idx DESC

SELECT a.idx , a.title , a.price , a.board_idx , c.name as company_name , d.name as device_name , e.name as type_name , f.name as genre_name FROM game a inner join game_type b ON a.idx = b.game_idx inner join category2 d ON b.category2_idx = d.idx inner join category c ON d.category_idx = c.idx inner join category3 e ON b.category3_idx = e.idx inner join genre f ON b.genre_idx = f.idx WHERE 1=1
AND d.idx IN (#{device_idx})
AND e.idx IN (#{type_idx})
SELECT a.idx , a.title , a.price , a.board_idx , b.user_idx , b.view_count , b.image , b.sub_image , b.content FROM game a INNER JOIN board b ON a.board_idx = b.idx WHERE a.idx = #{idx}
